item.title: Functional JavaScript
item.description: Functional programming is writing functions and expressions that are free from any side-effects, including mutating variables.

item.title: ES2015+
item.description: A quick overview of new JavaScript features in ES2015, ES2016, ES2017, ES2018 and beyond.

item.description: Express RESTful API Server with Knex and PostgreSQL and deployed to PCF.

item.title: JavaScript Date
item.description: The JavaScript Date constructor function and methods of Date objects.

item.title: JavaScript Modern Array Methods
item.description: Array methods are a powerful way to iterate over an array to create a new Array or value.

item.title: JavaScript Promises
item.description: A promise represents the eventual result of an asynchronous operation. JavaScript promises were added to the language in ES-2015.

item.title: JSDoc
item.description: JSDoc 3 is an API documentation generator for JavaScript, similar to Javadoc or phpDocumentor. You add documentation comments directly to your source code, right alongside the code itself. The JSDoc tool will scan your source code and generate an HTML documentation website for you.

item.title: Knex
item.description: Knex is an SQL query builder for Node.js. This guide targets v0.13.0.

item.title: React
item.description: React.js is a declarative, component based JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

item.title: React Router
item.description: React Router is a dynamic, distributed router for React.js.

item.title: regex
item.description: Regular Expressions are a powerful way to do pattern matching on strings.
